result.reason: To provide users with the ability to define reusable connection configurations, streamlining the creation of new connections with common settings.
result.approach: Create a new ConnectionPreset class for defining reusable connection configurations. Implement XML serialization/deserialization for presets. Develop a ConnectionPresetService for managing presets. Design a new UI dialog for preset management and integrate the ability to apply presets within the connection properties editor.
